verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
JESUS, HOW LOVELY YOU ARE.
You are so gentle, so pure and kind.
You shine as the morning star.
Jesus, how lovely You are.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, Jesus is my Lord and King.
Hallelujah, Jesus is my everything.
(Repeat first verse)
